column3: [' (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 1 green chilli)']
[' (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 1 tsp cilantro)']
[' (StepDescription: Peel-Peel 2 garlic cloves)']
[' (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 1/4 medium onion)']
[' (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 1/4 tomato)']
[' (StepDescription: Crack-Crack one egg in the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add  1 tbsp milk to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Mince-Mince peeled garlic cloves)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Whisk-Whisk the egg mixture in the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Heat-Heat 2 tbsp oil in a heavy-bottomed or nonstick pan on medium heat)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add chopped onions to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Saute-Saute the onions on medium heat until they are soft and translucent)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add chilli to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add garlic to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Cook-Cook for 1 minute
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1/8 tsp of turmeric to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add tomatoes to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Cook-Cook covered for 1 minute or until the tomatoes soften)']
[' (StepDescription: pour-Slowly pour the whisked eggs into the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: mixing-Keep mixing with a spatula for 3 minutes or until the eggs are almost cooked)']
[' (StepDescription: Garnish-Garnish with 1 tbsp chopped cilantro and serve)']
